title: The premium at the rate of 10% of the land rate mentioned in ASR without considering the guidelines therein shall be paid before granting the permission
clause_text: The premium at the rate of 10% of the land rate mentioned in ASR without considering the guidelines therein shall be paid before granting the permission.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
